steps.title: Discovery
steps.text: We analyze your needs, budget, and site conditions to recommend the perfect method.

steps.title: Design & Permit
steps.text: Our team tailors the plan and navigates the local zoning and coding maze for you.

steps.title: Fabrication
steps.text: While the foundation is poured on-site, your home is precision-manufactured in our facility.

steps.title: Assembly
steps.text: Whether module or panel, installation is rapid, clean, and quiet.

steps.title: Handover
steps.text: Walk into a fully finished home, built to a tolerance traditional construction can't match.
